title: What going to business school did for me
excerpt: As my first year of business school came to a close, I considered dropping out. It just didn't feel like my vibe. But I stuck it out, and I'm glad that I did. Now that I've graduated, I have time to reflect on this stage of my career, and specifically what it did for me as a person. I hope you enjoy it.

title: Sunsetting Google Plus
excerpt: Remembering my first year at Google which I spent helping to turn down Google+.

title: Understanding GCP Serverless VPC Access
excerpt: The technical and business rationale for Google Cloud Platform's Serverless VPC Access product.

title: What bicycling across the United States taught me about software engineering
excerpt: Some thoughts on how bicycling across the U.S. relates to software engineering.
